mapper.select: select p.id, p.name, c.name as productCategoryName, p.price, p.count, p.dcRate, p.img, p.detail from product p join product_category c on p.product_category_id = c.id order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into product ( name, product_category_id, price, count, dcRate, detail, img ) values ( #{name}, #{productCategoryId}, #{price}, #{count}, #{dcRate}, #{detail}, #{img} )
mapper.select: select max(id) as id from product;
select p.id, p.name, c.name as productCategoryName, p.price, p.count, p.dcRate, p.img, p.detail from product p join product_category c on p.product_category_id = c.id where p.id = #{id}
select img from product where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update product set name = #{name}, img = #{img}, price = #{price}, dcRate = #{dcRate}, count = #{count}, detail = #{detail} where id = #{id}
